description.value:
Clock faces and gears adorn the twisted iron shaft of a chronomancer staff, the hands of the clocks continually ticking or winding backward. Used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 greater striking speed staff. While wielding this staff, you also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Time Sense]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Déjà Vu], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Synchronize]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Loose Time's Arrow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Synchronize]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Day's Weight], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Haste], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Slow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Time Jump]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Curse Of Lost Time]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Quicken Time], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Rewinding Step], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stagnate Time]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cast into Time], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Day's Weight]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Time Beacon]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
